txt.en: This pile of gnawed, discarded remains could have been anything...possibly even a person at one point. You should examine the food-remains of the vicious hounds to see if any Men of Stangard or innocent passers-by fell victim to the evil dogs.

'It is shocking that things have gotten so bad as this! Rohirrim men -- warriors -- outnumbered by wild slavering dogs and falling prey to naught but filthy beasts in the plains.\n\n'At least you have thinned the pack somewhat, friend. Your work is deeply appreciated.'
The Nighthowlers' den is filled with the discarded remains of many victims of the vile dogs.
This is likely the remains of a person
This was an animal of some sort
Examine remains for signs of innocent victims ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Remain-piles can be found throughout the Nighthowlers' Den in Eorlsmead, east along the river from Stangard.\n\nYou should examine remains in the den for signs whether innocent passers-by have fallen victim to the wild dogs.
Examine remains for signs of animal victims ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sabert is at the north gate of Stangard.\n\nYou should return to Stangard with news of the human remains in the lairs of the wild dogs.
